sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Add RefQualifier for AIS Search Source</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[
    updateAisSearchSourceToAisDatasoureReference();

    function updateAisSearchSourceToAisDatasoureReference() {
      var glideRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
      glideRecord.addQuery("element", "datasource");
      glideRecord.addQuery("name", "ais_search_source");
      glideRecord.query();

      if(!glideRecord.next()){
        return;
      }

      glideRecord.setValue("reference_qual", "active=true^EQ");
      glideRecord.update();
    }
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-22 00:53:09</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8f87b33053c301107815ddeeff7b1275</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Add RefQualifier for AIS Search Source</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="AI Search" source="com.glide.ais">eb04fc283c31311068bcf327dfe37f93</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_8f87b33053c301107815ddeeff7b1275</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-22 00:53:09</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Add RefQualifier for AIS Search Source
